name: DirectoryEntry

contact.name: Visit the Github repository for more information

description: an entry in a directory. DirectoryEntry is a mixin that identifies the attributes that must or may be present in any element that can be represented as an entry in a Directory.

element.definition: an entry in a directory. DirectoryEntry is a mixin that identifies the attributes that must or may be present in any element that can be represented as an entry in a Directory.

element.name: href
element.short: a LocalURI that resolves to the full resource described by the DirectoryEntry
element.definition:
a LocalURI that resolves to the full resource described by the DirectoryEntry. This should be present if the service either (a) supports the Read functional profile for the specified
						type or (b) is aware of another service that does.

element.name: resourceName
element.short: a local identifier that names a unique resource within the context of type and the service context
element.definition:
a local identifier that names a unique resource within the context of type and the service context. This attribute must be present if the corresponding element has a local name. Note, however, that
					some elements (e.g. Association, ValueSetDefinition, etc.) do not local names and are identified exclusively by their href.

element.name: matchStrength
element.short: a relative measure of the "goodness of fit" of the directory entry within the context of the directoryFilter in the containing Directory
element.definition: a relative measure of the "goodness of fit" of the directory entry within the context of the directoryFilter in the containing Directory.
